name: mondo
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.dev: concurrently "node esbuild.config.mjs" "npx tailwindcss -i src/styles.css -o styles.css --watch --config tailwind.config.cjs"
scripts.build: npx tailwindcss -i src/styles.css -o styles.css --config tailwind.config.cjs --minify && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.deploy: yarn build && cp -f main.js styles.css manifest.json "/Users/marcopeg/Library/Mobile Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/Marco/.obsidian/plugins/mondo"
scripts.deploy:w: yarn build && cp -f main.js styles.css manifest.json "/Users/marpeg/Library/Mobile Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/Marco/.obsidian/plugins/mondo"
scripts.sync: set -e; SRC="/Users/marcopeg/Library/Mobile Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/Marco/"; DEST="/Users/marcopeg/dv/MarcoDev"; find "$DEST" -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 ! -name '.obsidian' -exec rm -rf {} +; rsync -a --exclude '.obsidian' --exclude '.obsidian/' "$SRC" "$DEST/"
scripts.release:clean: gh release list --limit 1000 --json tagName,isPrerelease | jq -r '.[] | select(.isPrerelease == true) | .tagName' | xargs -r -I {} gh release delete {} -y && gh release list --limit 1000 --exclude-pre-releases --json tagName,publishedAt | jq -r 'sort_by(.publishedAt) | reverse | .[1:] | .[] | .tagName' | xargs -r -I {} gh release delete {} -y
scripts.tag:prune: git tag -d $(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push --delete origin $(node -p "require('./package.json').version") || true
